snippet: Senator Claire McCaskill of Missouri, the nation’s most endangered Senate Democrat, will face Representative Todd Akin in the November election.
abstract: Missouri Sen Claire McCaskill, nation’s most endangered Senate Democrat, will face Republican Rep Todd Akin in the November election, after he narrowly defeats challengers John Brunner and Sarah Steelman in the state's primary.
lead_paragraph: Senator Claire McCaskill of Missouri, the nation’s most endangered Senate Democrat, will face Representative Todd Akin in the November election.

headline.seo: Todd Akin to Challenge Senator Claire McCaskill in Missouri
headline.main: Missouri Congressman to Take On McCaskill in Senate Race
headline.print_headline: Missouri Congressman to Take On McCaskill in Senate Race
